ApproxsimClient
Class StreamPVExporter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.StreamPVExporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimEventListener
public class StreamPVExporter
extends Object
implements ApproxsimEventListener

Subscribes to the aggreagate of all process variables in a region and prints them to a stream.
